languages.text: "Гвардейцы, они... не очень были разговорчивы. Один еще странно назвал меня — "мон-кай", кажется? А еще я слышал, как они говорили между собой. Что же там... "задержать корабль"... "не дать добраться"... куда-то... но я не знаю, куда... о-ох, снова находит!"

traits.locale_text: "Гвардейцы, они... не очень были разговорчивы. Один еще странно назвал меня — "мон-кай", кажется? А еще я слышал, как они говорили между собой. Что же там... "задержать корабль"... "не дать добраться"... куда-то... но я не знаю, куда... о-ох, снова находит!"

languages.text: "The Guards, they weren't... very chatty. One of them called me something strange — 'mon-keigh,' I think? And I heard them talking among themselves. Something about... 'seizing the ship'... 'don't let them through'... through to where, I don't know... oh, it's coming over me again!"
languages.original_text: "Гвардейцы, они... не очень были разговорчивы. Один еще странно назвал меня — "мон-кай", кажется? А еще я слышал, как они говорили между собой. Что же там... "задержать корабль"... "не дать добраться"... куда-то... но я не знаю, куда... о-ох, снова находит!"

"seizing the ship"... "don't let them through"... through to where, I don't know... oh, it's coming over me again!"

"The Guards, they weren't... very chatty. One of them called me something strange — 'mon-keigh,' I think? And I heard them talking among themselves. Something about... "seizing the ship"... "don't let them through"... through to where, I don't know... oh, it's coming over me again!"

"The Guards, they weren't... very chatty. One of them called me something strange — 'mon-keigh,' I think? And I heard them talking among themselves. Something about... 'seizing the ship'... 'don't let them through'... through to where, I don't know... oh, it's coming over me again!"

languages.text: 「衛兵たちは…おとなしかった。ひとりが、私を変な名前で呼びました…『モン＝ケイ』と言っていた気がします。お互いに何かを話していました。『船を制圧』とか…『奴らを通すな』と言っていたような…どこを指していたのかわかりませんが…ああ、思い出してきた！」
languages.original_text: "The Guards, they weren't... very chatty. One of them called me something strange — 'mon-keigh,' I think? And I heard them talking among themselves. Something about... 'seizing the ship'... 'don't let them through'... through to where, I don't know... oh, it's coming over me again!"

traits.locale_text: 「衛兵たちは…おとなしかった。ひとりが、私を変な名前で呼びました――"モン＝ケイ"と言っていた気がします。お互いに何かを話していました。"船を制圧"とか…"奴らを通すな"と言っていたような…どこを指していたのかわかりませんが…ああ、思い出してきた！」

languages.text: “那群帝国卫队的士兵，他们不是……特别健谈。其中有个人用奇怪的称呼叫我——‘猴子’？好像是这么叫的吧？我还听到他们在谈论些什么。像是……‘夺走这艘船’……‘别让他们通过’……但我不明白他们指的是通过哪里……啊，它又来了！”
languages.original_text: "The Guards, they weren't... very chatty. One of them called me something strange — 'mon-keigh,' I think? And I heard them talking among themselves. Something about... 'seizing the ship'... 'don't let them through'... through to where, I don't know... oh, it's coming over me again!"

traits.locale_text: “那群帝国卫队的士兵，他们不是……特别健谈。其中有个人用奇怪的称呼叫我——‘猴子’？好像是这么叫的吧？我还听到他们在谈论些什么。像是……‘夺走这艘船’……‘别让他们通过’……但我不明白他们指的是通过哪里……啊，它又来了！”

languages.text: «Los guardias no eran... muy habladores. Uno de ellos me llamó algo extraño, "mon-keigh", creo. Estaban hablando entre ellos de "capturar la nave"... y de "impedir el paso", pero no sé a quién ni a dónde... ¡vaya, me está volviendo a entrar esa sensación!».
languages.original_text: "The Guards, they weren't... very chatty. One of them called me something strange — 'mon-keigh,' I think? And I heard them talking among themselves. Something about... 'seizing the ship'... 'don't let them through'... through to where, I don't know... oh, it's coming over me again!"

traits.locale_text: «Los guardias no eran... muy habladores. Uno de ellos me llamó algo extraño, "mon-keigh", creo. Estaban hablando entre ellos de "capturar la nave"... y de "impedir el paso", pero no sé a quién ni a dónde... ¡vaya, me está volviendo a entrar esa sensación!».

languages.text: « Les gardes, ils n'étaient pas très... bavards. L'un d'entre eux m'a appelé par un nom étrange... "mon-keigh", il me semble ? Et je les ai entendus discuter entre eux. Ils parlaient de... "s'emparer du vaisseau"... "Ne les laissez pas passer"... Mais où, je l'ignore... Oh, je sens que ça me reprend ! »
languages.original_text: "The Guards, they weren't... very chatty. One of them called me something strange — 'mon-keigh,' I think? And I heard them talking among themselves. Something about... 'seizing the ship'... 'don't let them through'... through to where, I don't know... oh, it's coming over me again!"

traits.locale_text: « Les gardes, ils n'étaient pas très... bavards. L'un d'entre eux m'a appelé par un nom étrange... "mon-keigh", il me semble ? Et je les ai entendus discuter entre eux. Ils parlaient de... "s'emparer du vaisseau"... "Ne les laissez pas passer"... Mais où, je l'ignore... Oh, je sens que ça me reprend ! »

languages.text: "Die Wachen waren nicht ... sonderlich gesprächig. Eine von ihnen hat mich merkwürdig angesprochen – 'Chem-Pan-Sey', glaube ich. Und sie haben sich miteinander unterhalten. Es ging um ... 'das Schiff übernehmen' ... 'sie nicht durchlassen' ... wo durch, weiß ich nicht ... oh, jetzt kommt es wieder über mich!"
languages.original_text: "The Guards, they weren't... very chatty. One of them called me something strange — 'mon-keigh,' I think? And I heard them talking among themselves. Something about... 'seizing the ship'... 'don't let them through'... through to where, I don't know... oh, it's coming over me again!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Wachen waren nicht ... sonderlich gesprächig. Eine von ihnen hat mich merkwürdig angesprochen – 'Chem-Pan-Sey', glaube ich. Und sie haben sich miteinander unterhalten. Es ging um ... 'das Schiff übernehmen' ... 'sie nicht durchlassen' ... wo durch, weiß ich nicht ... oh, jetzt kommt es wieder über mich!"

languages.text: "Muhafızlar fazla konuşmuyordu. Birisi bana tuhaf bir şey söylemişti, 'mon-keigh' demişti galiba. Bir de kendi aralarında konuşurlarken duydum... 'Gemiyi ele geçirme' konusunu konuşuyor, 'geçmelerine izin vermeyin' gibi şeyler diyorlardı. Yalnız neredenini, nasılını bilemem. Aa, hatırlamaya başlıyorum!"
languages.original_text: "The Guards, they weren't... very chatty. One of them called me something strange — 'mon-keigh,' I think? And I heard them talking among themselves. Something about... 'seizing the ship'... 'don't let them through'... through to where, I don't know... oh, it's coming over me again!"

'Gemiyi ele geçirme' konusunu konuşuyor, 'geçmelerine izin vermeyin' gibi şeyler diyorlardı. Yalnız neredenini, nasılını bilemem. Aa, hatırlamaya başlıyorum!"
